select amountNum,addTime,totalMoney/100 totalMoney,xzfRate,amountMoney/100 amountMoney,status from m_amount m inner join sys_user s on m.userId = s.userId where 1=1
AND m.userId=#{relationMap.userId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(m.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(m.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND status = #{relationMap.status}
AND ( amountNum LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.fuzzyCondition}),'%') )
order by m.addTime desc
